General.Name: Kore Potash Plc
General.Description: Kore Potash plc, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration and development of potash minerals in the Republic of Congo. It holds a 97% interest in Sintoukola potash project that comprises the Kola sylvinite and carnallite deposits located to the north of the city of Pointe Noire. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 45 Gresham Street, London, United Kingdom, EC2V 7BG
